programmes.show_description: Bill Overton keeps you company all through the night with beautiful music for the early hours.
Join Jennifer for the ideal selection of music if you rise first thing in the morning.
Dan Walker has the perfect classical music to get you up in the morning, with all the news and travel updates you need to know for the day ahead, plus the Hall of Fame Hour at 9am.

programmes.show_name: The Classic FM Hall of Fame Hour
programmes.show_description: Dan Walker brings you an hour of the biggest classical hits from the Classic FM Hall of Fame - the annual Top 300 chart voted for by you.
Aled presents three hours of the best classical music including a track from his Album of the Week.
Join Anne-Marie Minhall for an hour of your requests, followed by two more hours of the very best classical music.
Anne-Marie Minhall presents her own selection of classical music favourites, including the Hall of Fame 3 at 3 - three pieces of music from the Classic FM Hall of Fame chart.
Tim Lihoreau plays the best music to take you into the evening, including a film favourite at 4.30pm and a recording by his Star in the Spotlight at 6pm.
Zeb Soanes eases you into the evening with a relaxing soundtrack of all-time favourites and contemporary classics.
Ritula Shah provides the perfect soothing soundtrack to help you wind down at the end of the day.
